Overview.Title: Buildable Guides
Overview.Description:
• Pack-A-Punch Guide (Coming Soon)
• Shield (Coming Soon)
• Death of Orion (Coming Soon)
• Acid Trap (Coming Soon)

Steps.ImageDescription: To activate Pack-A-Punch you need to ring the Gong's within the four towers. Each Gong will spawn either 4 tigers, a Brawler, a Gladiator or both a Brawler and Gladiator. On succefully killing all that spawn in on that gong, a head will be dropped which you will need to pickup.
On the back wall of the tower.
On the wall to the left of the stairs going down.
On the wall to the right of the stairs going down.
On the back wall of the tower.
You need to make your way down to the bottom area. You will need to interact with the 4 spikes.
Once the doors explode, Pack-A-Punch will be opened.

Steps.ImageLabel: Find the 3 parts to build the shield
Steps.ImageDescription: There are 3 parts in 9 possible locations. All of them listed below.

Steps.ImageLabel: Ra's Tower - Part One, Location One
Steps.ImageDescription: Top floor of Ra's Tower on the wall to the left of the stairs going down.

Steps.ImageLabel: Ra's Tower - Part One, Location Two
Steps.ImageDescription: Top floor of Ra's Tower on the wall to the right of the Mystery Box location.

Steps.ImageLabel: Ra's Tower - Part One, Location Three
Steps.ImageDescription: Top floor of Ra's Tower on the wall to the right of the stairs going down.

Steps.ImageLabel: Odin's Tower - Part Two, Location One
Steps.ImageDescription: Bottom floor of Odin's Tower, in the back right corner of the room.

Steps.ImageLabel: Odin's Tower - Part Two, Location Two
Steps.ImageDescription: Ground floor of Odin's Tower on the shelf on your left as you come up the stairs from the bottom floor.

Steps.ImageLabel: Odin's Tower - Part Two, Location Three
Steps.ImageDescription: Top floor of Odin's Tower, on the corner of this wall in between the stair case and window on the left.

Steps.ImageLabel: Zeus' Tower - Part Three, Location One
Steps.ImageDescription: Bottom floor of Zeus' Tower on the side near the bath house.

Steps.ImageLabel: Zeus' Tower - Part Three, Location Two
Steps.ImageDescription: Ground floor of Zeus' Tower near the statue's feet just as you come down the stairs from the upper floor.

Steps.ImageLabel: Zeus' Tower - Part Three, Location Three
Steps.ImageDescription: Top floor of Zeus' Tower near the statue's feet, to the left of the Zeus Perk.
The shield can only be built in The Pit area.
This is located underground in between the Danu and Ra rooms. This only appears after you have opened Pack-A-Punch.
On the bridge between Danu and Ra you will be able to see a flame in the shape of an arrow which will be pointing towards one of the towers. Go to that tower to find the stone head.
Bottom Floor, in the back left corener behind this.
Bottom floor, in the bath house, on the right hand side.
Bottom floor, next to the big fire pot, as you walk in from the underground area.
If you need help with this, check the Acid Trap guide!

Steps.ImageLabel: Place the head down in the acid trap
Steps.ImageDescription: Simply interact with the floor underneath the acid trap to place the head down.
You'll want to wait until the trap finishes
It's quite small, but you can check your inventory to make sure you've picked it up
The best place to go is within the spawn area. Just use your specialist, avoid the fire and don't go down. You will eventually get it fully positive.

Steps.ImageLabel: Wait for a gift from Ra
Steps.ImageDescription: Once you have full positive affinty the crowd will chuck things at you. Eventually you will hear an audio queue 'A gift from Ra'. They will throw a gold item down into the arena.
Simply interact with it.
Interact with the bottom of the tree within the bottom of Danu's Tower.

Steps.ImageLabel: Stab the item from the acid trap into the tree
Steps.ImageDescription: Just knife the tree where this whole is and it will go into the tree.
The gold cup should be filled up to the top.
Just interact with it.

Steps.ImageLabel: Find the mystery box and poison it
Steps.ImageDescription: To poison the mystery box, interact with the left side of the box where the skull is.
Your next spin will be a guaranteed Death of Orion.
There are 3 parts to find. They will always spawn in the same place.
The first part spawns in once the 3rd challenge of a players banner has been complete. It will spawn on the podium after you accept the reward for completing the 3rd challenge.
The second part can be found in the Pack-A-Punch room underneath the stair case.
The third part can be found in the Pack-A-Punch room underneath the stair case.
There are 4 possible locations the trap can be built.
In the entrance walkway from the spawn arena.
In the entrance walkway from the spawn arena.
In the stair case of the ground to upper floor.
In the stair case of the ground to upper floor.

Kill 5 zombie tigers or Survive a full round inside the temple or Stop 3 catalyst transformations or get 9 kills with the brazen bull (Shield) or break off 9 pieces of Gladiator Armor
Kill 5 zombie tigers or Survive a full round inside the temple or Stop 3 catalyst transformations or get 9 kills with the brazen bull (Shield) or break off 9 pieces of Gladiator Armor
Kill 5 zombie tigers or Survive a full round inside the temple or Stop 3 catalyst transformations or get 9 kills with the brazen bull (Shield) or break off 9 pieces of Gladiator Armor

Maintain maximum crowd affinity for 2 minutes or Kill 9 Gladiators or Strike the killing blow on a Blightfather or Hit 9 zombies with a single charged shot from the Death of Orion or Kill a Blightfather while being grappled by its tongue

Maintain maximum crowd affinity for 2 minutes or Kill 9 Gladiators or Strike the killing blow on a Blightfather or Hit 9 zombies with a single charged shot from the Death of Orion or Kill a Blightfather while being grappled by its tongue

Overview.Title: Main Easter Egg Guide
Overview.Description: • Coming Soon

Steps.ImageDescription: This Easter Egg can be done solo. It requires the Death of Orion wonder weapon and a Pack-A-Punched weapon with the Fire Bomb alternative ammo to really begin the Easter Egg. It's reccomended you focus on getting these during the first few rounds.

Cache Back - Max Ammo drops
Immolation Liquidation - Easy spins of the box
Perkaholic - All perks instantly
Shopping Free - Open up as much of the map as early as possible

Anywhere But Here - Easy to get out of tight situations
Temporal Gift - Longer Power Ups
Arsenal Accelerator - Quicker Specialist
Aftertaste - Keep perks after revive

Starting Weapon - Strife (/w stiletto knife)
Grenades - Wraith Fires
Specialist Weapon - Hammer of Valhalla
Perks:
PHD Slider - No Splash Damage
Dying Wish - Good for preventing a down
Timeslip - Fast Box spins and Pack-A-Punch & Quick Specialist Recharge
Staminup (Modifier Slot) - Infinite running & shoot while running
 Ideal Weapons - Quad Packed Helion Salvo/Quad Packed Mog 12 & Serkets Kiss and Homunculus

ToolExplanation.Title: How do I use the Pillar Step tool?
How do I use the Zodiac Step Tool?
ToolExplanation.Explanation: Once the statue destroyed in the Main Hall, 3 Zodiac symbols spawn around the map in different rooms. Each room that contains a zodiac symbol in it, will have up to 3 places where the scratches can spawn. Add up the amount of scratches in the room and input the amount on that symbol into the tool. If there isn't a scratch in a spawn location that means the value is 0.
